publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1240 Mr Jim Wallace: UK Legislation - Criminal Justice and Court Services Bill-That the Parliament notes that changes to the current registrations scheme for the registering of sex offenders under the Sex Offenders Act 1997 are proposed in amendments in the Criminal Justice and Court Services Bill currently before the UK Parliament; recognises the practical importance of consistency across the United Kingdom, and agrees that provisions to achieve these ends should be considered in the Bill by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Angus MacKay*
